page.title: 18THE SCHOOL VISIT
page.content: Yesterday our class went on a trip to Hornsea Pottery.We went first to the World of Wings where they have lots of birds of prey consisting mainly of owls and falcons.The warden told us about each bird in turn.Quite a few of the birds had been given to the RSPCA by people who took them from the woods as babies thinking it was a good thing.They then couldn't look after them and handed them in.Mr Smith then untied a Lanner Falcon from its perch,and started swinging a lure.The falcon caught the lure after several attempts.After that we went to Butterfly world where there are five hundred different species of butter flies.After walking around the model village,we went for lunch.For lunch we had beefburger,chips and beans and fruit salad.
